name: Accounting, Auditing, and Bookkeeping Services
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that provide accounting, bookkeeping, billing, payroll and
other related auditing services, including Certified Public
Accountants (CPAs). Such merchants also may provide income tax
preparation services in addition to accounting and auditing services.
For merchants that provide income tax preparation services without
also providing accounting, auditing, and bookkeeping services, use
MCC 7276.
